Name: Switch to placement mode
Description: Switches to placement mode, to place large chunks of blocks or blueprints

Name: Switch to selection mode
Description: Switches to selection mode, to remove blocks or create blueprints

Name: Undo
Description: Undoes the last change to the building

Name: Redo
Description: Redoes the last undone change to the building

Name: Rotate X
Description: Rotates the current block placement/selection volume in X

Name: Rotate Y
Description: Rotates the current block placement/selection volume in Y

Name: Rotate Z
Description: Rotates the current block placement/selection volume in Z

Name: Flip X
Description: Flips the current block placement/selection volume in X

Name: Flip Y
Description: Flips the current block placement/selection volume in Y

Name: Flip Z
Description: Flips the current block placement/selection volume in Z

Name: Copy
Description: Copies the currently selected blocks to the clipboard

Name: Paste
Description: Prepares to paste the last copied blocks

Name: Cycle block shape
Description: Cycles the block shape being placed

Name: Cycle block material
Description: Cycles the block material being placed

Name: Hold to select an object to move
Description: While held, clicking on an existing placed object will remove it from the building and allow it to be placed elsewhere

Name: Hold to remove object(s)
Description: While held, clicking on an existing placed object will remove it from the building
